title: Funnydruids
author: Funnydruids
created_time: June 08, 2022, 07:31:16 PMLast edit: June 06, 2023, 10:13:10 AM by Funnydruids
content: I looking for anyone can give me a good deal, I can use paxful or LCB with Escrow.Right now its very bad dealsScammers, please save your and mine time and dont message.

comments.author: Funnydruids
comments.body: Quote from: Chahan on June 09, 2022, 04:56:30 AMQuote from: Funnydruids on June 08, 2022, 07:31:16 PMI looking for anyone can give me a good deal, I can use paxful or LCB with Escrow.Right now its very bad dealsI got Telegram: @CyberCryptoCowboyScammers, please save your and mine time and dont message.Isn't it possible to deposit btc directly into your skrill account?  No its not.I know in some countrys you can take out to a crypto wallet, but not with my account country.Deposit directly its not possible either. I only got CC as option to deposit. Damn I wish I had take out to a crypto wallet, it would change my life.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Funnydruids on June 08, 2022, 07:31:16 PMI looking for anyone can give me a good deal, I can use paxful or LCB with Escrow.Right now its very bad dealsI got Telegram: @CyberCryptoCowboyScammers, please save your and mine time and dont message.I've never used paxful, but if it's anything like LocalBitcoins it's just a scam waiting to happen.  Especially if you're accepting fiat payments for crypto.  The best (and safest) P2P exchange I've used is Bisq.  If you only deal with signed and aged accounts it can be very safe.  Bisq is not completely without risk, but certainly safer than LocalBitcoins.

comments.author: LDU QUITO
comments.body: Send me private if u still need

comments.author: Funnydruids
comments.body: Quote from: Chahan on June 10, 2022, 01:52:24 PMOnly cc as deposit option?? Nothing else?! Normally there are so many options.As I said in the message up.It depends what country you are from.I am from Thailand and only got CC as option.I got friends from Sweden and they got alot of options.You can also send out BTC from your Skrill account there.

comments.author: Funnydruids
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on June 10, 2022, 04:27:00 PMQuote from: Funnydruids on June 08, 2022, 07:31:16 PMI looking for anyone can give me a good deal, I can use paxful or LCB with Escrow.Right now its very bad dealsI got Telegram: @CyberCryptoCowboyScammers, please save your and mine time and dont message.I've never used paxful, but if it's anything like LocalBitcoins it's just a scam waiting to happen.  Especially if you're accepting fiat payments for crypto.  The best (and safest) P2P exchange I've used is Bisq.  If you only deal with signed and aged accounts it can be very safe.  Bisq is not completely without risk, but certainly safer than LocalBitcoins.Haha yeah sure dude. /cut /cut
